name: Composer - Tokens
description:
We have created the most flexible and robust Design System to enable you to easily deploy your brand color scheme, fonts, images, and styles into it. Simple, modular and accessible components that will surely power up your designs.

 

Composer Design System uses design tokens instead of hard coded values to ensure a better UI consistency across different platforms.

 

Use this file in combination of the Composer Design System - Theme and Components, Composer Design System - Blocks and Surfaces, and Composer Design System - Icons and Illustrations.

 

Learn more about Composer at: cmpsr.io and storybook.cmpsr.io
